channel.title: MobaMon
channel.description:
I started working today on this idea I had which seemed like a fun project.
MobaMon is - like the name points out - a small Moba game, situated in the Pokémon universe.
Obviously evolving at certain levels will be involved, as will unlocking new pokemon-specific attacks on certain levels be. The jungle camps will be taken care of by Team Rocket members. I'm thinking about taking Lugia and Ho-oh as titans. More details will be added later.
The client is written in Java, the server in C#/F# .NET. This is still subject to change though!
Any tips and / or suggestions are highly appreciated!
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/45f417a6468f2042c8f758869b3d6be2.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3366e67c35fc7d220c6370d6b98bbdb7.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/e3rYhYw.gifv

item.title: MobaMon
item.dc:creator: @Kattoor Snow_
item.description:
@Kattoor wrote:

Soulcist:

Interesting development, hope to see you pursue this further instead of giving up on it. I wish for the best of luck!

I haven’t had any time to continue working on this recently.
The latest video I have: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z-TRbBUEAo
It’s not up to date though, I also made a team-system.
